com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform

Class DbTriggerBasedHistoryDdl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform.DbTriggerBasedHistoryDdl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlatformHistoryDdl
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    H2HistoryDdl, MySqlHistoryDdl, PostgresHistoryDdl

    public abstract class DbTriggerBasedHistoryDdl
extends Object
implements PlatformHistoryDdl
    Uses DB triggers to maintain a history table.
